alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Montgomery; Pike; Warren (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 26 at 8:25AM CDT until August 26 at 9:30AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lincoln County in east central Missouri... Northeastern Montgomery County in east central Missouri... Northeastern Warren County in east central Missouri... Southeastern Pike County in northeastern Missouri... * Until 930 AM CDT. * At 824 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Hartford, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Troy, Wright City, Elsberry, Moscow Mills, Winfield, Davis, Hawk Point, Eolia, Bellflower, Fountain N` Lakes, Chain of Rocks, New Hartford, Foristell, Old Monroe, Silex, Foley, Hamburg, Truxton, Whiteside, and Cave. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 199 and 200. This also includes Cuivre River State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
